description: Detects a possible persistence mechanism using RUN key for Windows Explorer and pointing to a suspicious folder Author: Florian Roth, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Registry Persistence via Explorer Run Key
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Policies\\Explorer\\Run) AND (winlog.event_data.Details:(C\:\\Windows\\Temp\\* OR C\:\\ProgramData\\* OR C\:\\$Recycle.bin\\* OR C\:\\Temp\\* OR C\:\\Users\\Public\\* OR C\:\\Users\\Default\\*) OR winlog.event_data.Details:*\\AppData\\*))
